name: Andrélon Conditioner zilver care
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Keratin (Keratine), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Amandelolie), Parfum, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Limonene. Linalool, CI 60730.
